articles.author: Lena H. Sun
articles.title: Death from Ebola-like virus reported in Iowa after travel to West Africa - The Washington Post
articles.description: The rare viral hemorrhagic fever can be transmitted among humans through infected body fluids, but not casual contact such as hugging or shaking hands.
articles.content: A person from Iowa who recently returned to the United States from West Africa died Monday from a rare viral hemorrhagic fever that can be transmitted among humans through infected body fluids, state… [+334 chars]
